resources.string: • UnlockFood places a banner on your lock screen which generates advertising revenue every time you unlock your phone. That money is then used to feed hungry people all over the world.
1. Download unlockfood app for free on google play
5. Check the dashboard by click the app icon
• App is not meant to override the actual android pincode settings due to security purpose.

- Activating this administrator will allow the app Unlockfood to perform the following operations:

 •Lock the screen - Control how and when the screen locks
 •Change the screen-unlock password
